title: Valpo Velvet
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Dairy ice cream store owned by third-generation locals. Also serving lunch including large selection of sandwiches, soup, salads, desserts. vThe bread is locally sourced from the town bakery. Has Wi-Fi (maybe need to pay). Colorful chalkboard menu, poems painted on the walls and chairs that pay homage to cows, kids, nature and mother earth. The ice cream contains gelatin, but there is a small section of sorbet that is okay for vegetarians.
